1.0.name: wordpress/toolbar-remixed-free
1.0.description:
Control and Customize the WordPress Toolbar. Toolbar Remixed allows you to change the style and functionality of the WordPress Toolbar. You can choose from blue or black colors in the free version, and the toolbar style is enhanced with box shadows and a bit of text shadow to make it stand out even more.

You can also hide menus and buttons that appear by default in the WordPress toolbar such as the My Sites menu, the WordPress logo menu, the Comments button, the New Content and Edit buttons, the Updates button, the Search box, and the Site Name menu. Additionally, you can hide BuddyPress menus that appear under the User Menu on the far right side - Activity, Blogs, Friends, Groups, etc. can all be hidden to clean up the WordPress toolbar to make it easier for users to find what they need fast and with style.

Also you can change the text that appears in the user menu of the WordPress toolbar when you login. Usually it says "Howdy, username" but you can change it to th
